Article.title: Article
Article.description: Represents a blog article, with content sourced from Markdown files.

title.description: Title of the article, from frontmatter.

content.description: The full content of the article in markdown format.

author.description: Author of the article, from frontmatter.

category.description: The category of the article, from frontmatter.

slug.description: URL-friendly slug, derived from the filename.

description.description: Meta description for SEO, from frontmatter.

date.description: The date the article was published, from frontmatter.

image.description: URL for the article's featured image.

UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public profile information.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user profile was created.

authorId.description: The UID of the user who wrote the comment.

authorName.description: The display name of the author at the time of commenting.

authorAvatar.description: The avatar URL of the author at the time of commenting.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the comment was created.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public information for each user.

/comments/{articleSlug}/messages/{messag.description: Stores comments for a specific article, where {articleSlug} is the unique slug of the article.
